PLInstrumentRunner Class Reference

#import <PLInstrumentRunner.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(id) - initWithResultHandler:
 Initialize the instrumentation runner with the provided result handler.
(void) - runAllCases
 Locate all subclasses of PLInstrumentCase registed with the Objective-C runtime, and execute all instrumentation methods.
(void) - runCase:
 Execute all instrumentation methods for the given instrumentation test case.

Detailed Description

Implements execution of "instrument" methods in a PLInstrumentCase.

Implements runtime detection and execution of PLInstrumentCase instrumentation classes.
